    <sys_variable_value action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">

        <sys_updated_on>2021-06-30 12:05:32</sys_updated_on>
        <value>var strLog = '';
function Log(strText)
{
	strLog = strLog + "\n" + strText;
}
(function(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual)
{
	var RenderValue = x_snc_devtools.RenderValue;

	var bResult = true;
	
	function TestCase_GlideRecordSetValue(grInput, strInputField, vInputValue, bExpected)
	{
		Log('TestCase_GlideRecordSetValue');
		//Log('Input Table: '+RenderValue(strInputTable));
		//Log('Input SysId: '+RenderValue(strInputSysId));
		Log('Input Field: '+RenderValue(strInputField));
		Log('Input Value: '+RenderValue(vInputValue));
		Log('Expected   : '+RenderValue(bExpected));
		var vResult = GlideRecordSetValue(grInput, strInputField, vInputValue);
		GlideRecordUpdate(grInput);
		Log('Result  : '+RenderValue(vResult));
		
		if (IsEqual(vResult,bExpected) == false)
		{
			bResult = false;
			Log('Test case FAILED: Unexpected return value.');
		}
		else
		{
			if (bExpected == true)
			{
				var grRecord = new GlideRecord(grInput.getRecordClassName());
				if (grRecord.get(grInput.sys_id) == false)
				{
					Log('Test case UNDEFINED: Record could not be loaded.');
				}
				else
				{
					var vResultValue = grRecord.getValue(strInputField)
					if (IsEqual(vResultValue,vInputValue) == false)
					{
						bResult = false;
						Log('Test case FAILED: Value has not been set.');
					}
				}
			}
		}
		Log('');
	}

	var strSysId = GetRecordFromTestStep('f0dc29b91b45b8105331b8449b4bcbb4');
	
	var grRecord = new GlideRecord('sysauto_script');
	grRecord.get(strSysId);
	
	TestCase_GlideRecordSetValue(grRecord,'script','//test',true);
	
	stepResult.setOutputMessage(strLog);
	return bResult;
	
})(outputs, steps, stepResult, assertEqual);</value>
        <variable display_value="Test script">989d9e235324220002c6435723dc3484</variable>
    </sys_variable_value>
</record_update>
